T02D2031:119b-1: rakta ya m'a ri s'a dha nam /
T02D2031:119b-3: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2031:119b-4: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2031:119b-5: 'jig rten gsum la mi 'jigs spyin pa'i sku sprul thus ni zhi ba'i rang bzhin can //
T02D2031:119b-6: sku ni dmar po'i rnam par mdzad cing 'jigs par mdzad pa 'gro ba'i don bsgrub pa //
T02D2031:119b-7: bdud kyi sde rnams sngangs par mdzad dpal dus kyi dgra bo dmar po la btud nas //
T02D2031:119b-8: de yi sgrub thabs rgyas pa ma yin nyung du 'di ni bdag gis bri bar bya //
T02D2031:119b-9: sngags pas dang por bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug rang gi snying gar aom yig las skyes pa'i //
T02D2031:119b-10: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su h'um yig dmar po mtshungs pa med pa'i gzugs 'bar ba //
T02D2031:119b-11: de las 'phros pa'i 'od zer dmar pos nam mkhar spyan drangs sangs rgyas bla ma rnams //
T02D2031:119b-12: dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar la sogs dang bcas mngon par dmigs nas h'um yig las //
T02D2031:119b-13: sna tshogs me tog dri bzangs bdug pa rnams pa du mas mchod pa'i cho ga rdzogs byas la //
T02D2031:120a-0: bdag tu rtog pa'i sdig pa gang yod de ni de rnams mdun du bshags @120a * //
T02D2031:120a-2: phyi nas cho ga lhag ma cho ga ji bzhin bsgrubs nas stong nyid bsgom bya ste //
T02D2031:120a-3: aom sh'u n+ya la sogs pa'i tshig gis de rjes aom yig las skyes nyi ma la //
T02D2031:120a-4: yi ge h'um las sprul pa'i dbyug pa ri bong 'dzin mtshungs rlan bcas mi mgos mtshan //
T02D2031:120a-5: yi ge h'um gis rnam brgyan de rnams mtha' dag yun ring rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02D2031:120a-6: sgom pa po yis dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar gnyug ma'i sku ni yang dag bsam //
T02D2031:120a-7: g-yon brkyang stabs kyis bzhugs pa shin tu rnam 'gyur sku dmar kun nas rmad du byung //
T02D2031:120a-8: drag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis dang ldan g-yas dang cig shos dag na nges gnas pa //
T02D2031:120a-9: khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa dang ni rdo rje'i dbyug pa dkar po mi mgos mtshan //
T02D2031:120a-10: sku la sbrul gyi tshogs kyis rim pa bzhin du brgyan pas mdzes byas dbu skyes ni //
T02D2031:120a-11: dmar ser gyen du gnas shing stag gi pags pa rlan bcas na bza' byas pa ste //
T02D2031:120a-12: mgul nas rab tu 'khyud pa'i mdzes ma yang dag dam pa'i rang 'od thod pa skom po yi //
T02D2031:120a-13: phreng ba dang ldan na bza' dang bral phyag gnyis ldan nas zhal gcig chu skyes ni //
T02D2031:120a-14: dam du 'khyud cing kha sbyor ro gcig g-yas brkyang ba yi stabs kyis bzhugs pa mo //
T02D2031:120a-15: phyi nas mgon po'i thugs kar rab tu gtum pa'i 'od ldan de yang h'um yig las /
T02D2031:120a-16: skyes pa'i dbyug pa shin tu dkar ba 'dzag bcas mi mgo dang ldan 'od 'bar ba //
T02D2031:120a-17: de dbus shin tu dmar ba'i yi ge h'um mchog 'bar ba'i nyi ma la gnas pa //
T02D2031:120a-18: mkhas pas blta bya bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang ba'i bye brag h'um skyes rdo rje ste //
T02D2031:120a-19: sa bon aom mchog yongs gyur las byung bcom ldan 'das ma'i gsang ba chu skyes 'dab brgyad pa //
T02D2031:120a-20: slar aom sarba zhas sogs mnyam med gsang sngags sgrub pa po yis brjod par bya //
T02D2031:120a-21: de nas lte ba'i 'og tu padma 'dab brgyad kun nas dmar ba yang dag 'bar //
T02D2031:120a-22: hr'i: yig bsams te de steng re kh'a dkar po gyen du langs pa nam mkhar phyogs //
T02D2031:120a-23: shin tu dmar ba'i mnyam med khyab bdag dpal ldan gshin rje gshed po bsgoms par bya //
T02D2031:120b-0: 'gro ba thams cad 'di 'drar srung pha mnyam par kun nas @120b 'khrigs //
T02D2031:120b-1: ma he'i steng na rgyal po bzhin du mnyam bzhugs bla na med //
T02D2031:120b-2: ji ltar gsungs pa'i dam tshig can gyi rnal 'byor dam tshig ston 'gro bas //
T02D2031:120b-3: dogs pa kun dang bral ba'i yid kyis thun gsum bsgom par bya //
T02D2031:120b-4: de la nges par 'gro ba'i bla ma mchod 'di legs par grub 'gyur bsgoms pa las //
T02D2031:120b-5: 'jig rten snang bar byed pa rnam par brtan byed rab tu rtsom pa'i rim pa 'dis //
T02D2031:120b-6: sngags pa'ang de nas brtsams te nyin re bzhin du lha dang lha min bdag po yi //
T02D2031:120b-7: bka' las mi 'da' gdug pa drag po 'byung po sogs kyis nges par bde ba sgrub //
T02D2031:120b-9: dam tshig byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so //
T02D2031:120b-10: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2031:120b-11: aom ya m'anta ka h'um phat /
T02D2031:120b-12: dpal ldan gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
T02D2031:120b-13: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gi / gsung rnams
T02D2031:120b-14: mnyan nas rnam par snang mdzad srung ba bdag gis
T02D2031:120b-16: bsgrub pa'i ched du brtsams pa'i bsod nams dri med dam pa gang zhig thob pa des //
T02D2031:120b-17: srid pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i lus can nyon mongs
T02D2031:120b-18: mun nag yang dag 'joms par shog / gshin rje
T02D2031:120b-19: gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs dpal rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2031:120b-20: srung bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2031:120b-23: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen
T02D2031:120b-24: po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga
T02D2031:120b-25: nas tshag lo ts'a ba dge slong chos rje dpal
